title.rendered: Rig inspection & dynamic positioning assurance continues

content.rendered:
AqualisBraemar and Hose International inspection teams are continuing to support a client’s rig intake program through this difficult time. Our specialists, both offshore and onshore, have been working together supporting ongoing assurance programs for our clients. Our robust IT systems and collaborative work solutions have allowed us to keep our clients’ projects on track.

We have successfully continued to support both our client and the drilling contractor with remote dynamic positioning assurance trials. Working together as one team, the client, drilling contractor, AqualisBraemar and Hose international have successfully continued with remote dynamic positioning assurance and onsite well control equipment assurance.

We will continue to support our clients through these challenging times with innovative solutions to keep their projects on schedule.

excerpt.rendered: AqualisBraemar and Hose International inspection teams have been continuing to support a client’s rig intake program through this difficult time.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar and HOSE International enter inspection partnership
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar and HOSE International have signed a memorandum of understanding to jointly provide rig and well control inspection services for the offshore industry.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Meet the team: Steven Lee
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: During my career, I spent 20 years sailing onboard merchant vessels, mostly involved in offshore oil and gas projects, and for the last 10 years I have been focussed on assurance and compliance of drilling rigs and offshore vessels.

jetpack-related-posts.title: How to Survive a Rig Inspection: Part 15
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: An inspection team will want to see that the system is being well maintained and operated, with the appropriate dynamic positioning reference systems being used for the drilling rig's operations.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dropped Objects Inspection and Management Systems Audit conducted by AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our Offshore Technical Services division recently assisted an international operator offshore West Africa on one of their contracted drilling units. There had been numerous incidents over the preceding six months that thankfully did not result in any personnel injury but were of growing concern to the operator. AqualisBraemar conducted a…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Partnership with HOSE International
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar and HOSE International are pleased to announce their partnering to provide world class Rig & Well Control Equipment Inspection Services.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Rig inspection contract to AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Brunei Shell Petroleum Company Sdn Bhd (BSP) has awarded AqualisBraemar a frame agreement to conduct rig inspection services for the operator.
